    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="en">A tennis ball</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Tenniskugel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une boule de tennis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma esfera de tênis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una sfera di tennis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σφαίρα αντισφαίρισης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una pelota de tenis</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a tennis ball slowing down as it travels through the air because of air resistance or drag.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air resistance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">drag</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tennis ball</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine verlangsamende 
Tenniskugel, während sie durch die Luft wegen des Luftwiderstandes 
oder -gegenkraft reist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une boule de tennis 
ralentissant pendant qu'elle voyage par l'air en raison de la 
résistance ou de la drague d'air.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma esfera de tênis que 
retarda para baixo enquanto viaja através do ar por causa da 
resistência ou do arrasto do ar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una sfera di tennis 
che rallenta mentre attraversa through l'aria a causa di resistenza o 
di resistenza dell'aria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει σφαίρα αντισφαίρισης 
επιβραδύνοντας καθώς ταξιδεύει μέσω του αέρα λόγω της 
αντίστασης ή της έλξης αέρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una pelota de tenis que
retrasa mientras que viaja a través del aire debido a resistencia o 
la fricción del aire.</string>
          </description>
